full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,LCAM SRING DGUN GYI RGYAL MO'I SGO NAS DRI MED THAB BZLOG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006B 'DI'I LO RGYU DANG PHAN YON NI, SNGON TSE RGYA GAR BOD KYI ZA HOR RGYAL PO ZHES BYA BA ZHIG YOD, ,RGYAL PO BLON PO SOGS GSER DNGUL RDZAS NOR DANG 'BRU LA SOGS LONGS SPYOD RAB TU RGYAS, ,KLONG TSE RNGA MONG RKANG PHYUGS GRANGS MED MANG ZHING PHYUG PA DANG, MNGA' THANG CHEN PO RGYAL PO DE BU MANG PA'I PHYIR,  BSAM GYIS MI KHYAB PA SDUG YOD PA LAS, ,LO GSUM LON PA NAS RGUD PA CHEN PO 'BYUNG LA, NOR @007A *, ,PHYUGS ZAD PAR BU TSA 'PHONGS PAR 'GYUR CING, ,MI LA NA TSA NAD RIMS SHI CHAD DANG, PHYUGS LA GOD KHA RGYUN MI CHAD PA'I CHED DU, ,GROL BA'I MAN NGAG BSKUL BA'I NGOR, SHU DHA DNYA' N'A PANYDZA GYIS BRIS SO, ,BKRA SHIS, ,)
